content:
BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.nasa.gov/audience/forstudents/k-4/stories/nasa-knows/who-was-neil-armstrong-k4.html
ENDCONTEXT
Neil Armstrong became the first man to walk on the moon on July 20, 1969. As part of NASA's Apollo 11 mission, Armstrong famously declared "That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind" upon stepping onto the lunar surface .

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Who was the first man to walk on the moon and what did he say upon landing?

ENDINSTRUCTION

Neil Armstrong was the first man to walk on the moon. He was part of NASA's Apollo 11 mission and landed on the moon on July 20, 1969. Upon stepping onto the lunar surface, he famously said, "That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind."
